alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Harris; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:35PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meriwether, Troup, southeastern Coweta and western Harris Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1135 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Louise to Robert G. Pitts Airport, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Greenville, West Point, Hogansville, Grantville, Pine Mountain, Luthersville, Moreland, Haralson, Lone Oak, Gay, Goat Rock Lake, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, Stovall, Mountain Hill, Harrisonville and Hillcrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
